title: Chris Bradford's 2 Ruff Krew
description: Kung fu master Chris Bradford and his krew take on the evil villains of the world.
quote: I’m going to kick your communist butt so hard it’ll fly up and land on your head like a butt beret.
altHero: Chris Bradford, buff shirtless bearded white guy
